features: Asymmetrical design featuring a detailed peacock motif encrusted with multi-colored gemstones on one side and a floral arrangement studded with brilliant-cut diamonds on the other. The peacock features delicate filigree work. Modern collar design with intricate gemstone settings. The piece showcases a contemporary take on traditional South Indian jewelry design. Floral and paisley designs.
description: A unique fusion of traditional South Indian motifs with a contemporary collar design. The vibrant gemstone combination offers a fresh and modern aesthetic while retaining the elegance of classic craftsmanship. Perfect for the modern bride or anyone seeking a statement piece. The asymmetrical design adds a bold and unconventional touch. Excellent gold purity and gemstone quality ensure lasting value.
